actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970.

summary.text: Extends for three months (until July 1, 1974) those provisions of the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 which relate to the date before which a State under such Act may provide its determination of the existence of an "on" or "off" indicator for the purpose of measuring extended benefits periods.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970.
